game_description: If you are a social expert, you can interact with other users in real-time voice chat, send emoji bubbles, and make unexpected actions in the game lobby. But if you are a social novice, there is no need to worry at all, there are many unique ice-breaking mini-games in the game lobby. You can also experience different modes of the game with other players in the game room. It's a stress-free world where you can have fun with your friends! Game Mode: -Scruffle Mode: Pick up any item on the ground at will, smash mercilessly at your opponent, and win! -Handball Mode: Team up with your teammates to pass, shoot, and score! Smash your opponents and hinder their attacks! -Graffiti Mode: Use props with different functions, let your imagination run wild, and turn the surrounding walls into works of art that only belong to you!
review_1: Won’t even load me in. Every time I try it does the opening cutscene and then it’s a black screen.
review_2: This game could use some polish but other than that it's great and super fun and easy to learn I've been playing it for days and I'm addicted and it's so much fun what they need to add 1. More ways to play 2. More skins 3. More maps

review_5: The genre mashup of sports, graffiti, cartoons, first-person shooters is likely to be more in the future, and it's a lot of fun to play. You can get more character skins to dress up through
